DOC.brief_summary: This study determine appropriate dose regimen GS-9820 subject lymphoid malignancy . This Phase 1b , open-label , dose-escalation expansion study evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics , pharmacodynamics , antitumor activity GS-9820 .
